title: MetaTableAI – LLM-Powered Table Extractor
shortDesc: Built a parser that extracts key parameters from complex PDF tables using LangGraph + OpenRouter APIs.
fullDesc: MetaTableAI automates parameter extraction from messy tabular PDFs by combining LangGraph nodes with dynamic prompt chaining. It detects headers, context, and units with fuzzy alignment to produce structured JSON outputs for analytics pipelines.

title: RAG-based Personal AI Chatbot
shortDesc: FastAPI backend + Mistral 7B + FAISS vector search for contextual responses.
fullDesc: Developed a lightweight RAG system with FastAPI and FAISS vector indexing. Uses local embeddings for privacy, contextual memory persistence, and streaming chat responses .

title: DreamCatcher – AI-Powered Dream Interpretation Web App
shortDesc: Developed a full-stack AI chatbot that interprets user dreams using MistralAI and Tavily Search.
fullDesc: DreamCatcher fetches live symbolic meanings via Tavily API, analyzes sentiment and archetypes using MistralAI, and presents calming visual feedback through a React UI built with soft gradients and subtle animations.

title: InfraMind – AI DevOps Agent for Cloud Infra
shortDesc: An agentic system that simulates aws services like EC2 and S3 through prompts
fullDesc: InfraMind is an intelligent assistant that lets you manage AWS resources using natural language.It runs fully locally with LocalStack and uses LLMs (DeepSeek/OpenRouter) for intent detection.

title: AskSheetsAI
shortDesc: Conversational AI interface for Excel and Google Sheets.
fullDesc: Supports querying and extracts required data from excel and google sheets
